viewtabbar_p.cxx

00001 #include "viewtabbar_p.hpp"
00002 #include "ui/viewtabbar.hpp"
00003 #include <KDE/KDebug>
00004 #include <KDE/KIcon>
00005 #include <KDE/KLocale>
00006 #include <QtGui/QAction>
00007 #include <QtGui/QMenu>
00008 using namespace Aki;
00009 
00010 ViewTabBarPrivate::ViewTabBarPrivate(ViewTabBar* qq)
00011     : QObject(),
00012     _q(qq)
00013 {
00014     _q->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
00015     connect(_q, SIGNAL(customContextMenuRequested(QPoint)),
00016             SLOT(customContextMenuRequested()));
00017 }
00018 
00019 void
00020 ViewTabBarPrivate::customContextMenuRequested()
00021 {
00022     if (!_q->createPopupMenu()) {
00023         return;
00024     }
00025 
00026     contextMenuPosition = QCursor::pos();
00027     _q->createPopupMenu()->exec(contextMenuPosition);
00028 }
00029 
00030 void
00031 ViewTabBarPrivate::setupContextActions()
00032 {
00033     QAction* action = new QAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("edit-redo")), i18n("Reconnect"), contextMenu);
00034     contextMenu->addAction(action);
00035 
00036     action = new QAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("edit-delete")), i18n("Disconnect"), contextMenu);
00037     contextMenu->addAction(action);
00038 
00039     contextMenu->addSeparator();
00040 
00041     action = new QAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("")), i18n("Close Tab"), contextMenu);
00042     connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00043             SLOT(closeTabTriggered()));
00044     contextMenu->addAction(action);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void
00048 ViewTabBarPrivate::closeTabTriggered()
00049 {
00050     contextMenuPosition = _q->mapFromGlobal(contextMenuPosition);
00051     _q->removeTab(_q->tabAt(contextMenuPosition));
00052     contextMenuPosition = QPoint();
00053 }
